description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Kyiv With Roasted Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Zucchini,Soy free,Sweet potato,Chicken,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Chicken Kyiv With Roasted Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sweet potatoes, peeled, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine cauliflower and sweet potato in a roasting pan. Drizzle with oil, season with salt, pepper and some of the thyme. Bake for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, cut a pocket into the side of each chicken fillet at the thicker end. Spread 2 tsp of the garlic butter into each pocket and secure with toothpicks.

Coat chicken with egg and breadcrumbs. Add to roasting pan along with carrots, zucchini and onion. Cook for 2025 minutes or until chicken is golden and cooked through. Serve with lemon wedges and sprigs of remaining thyme.
